I updated my [aHrefs bulk link analysis script](http://www.christopheryee.org/bulk-link-analysis-ahrefs-api-ruby/) to improve its functionality by adding two features.



	
  1. The script now returns the results in a CSV file called _ahrefs_results.csv_

	
  2. Introduces the _.map_ Ruby enumerable for a "cleaner" syntax




<blockquote>The source code for this Ruby script can be found at [my Github repository](https://github.com/Eeysirhc/ahrefs-api).</blockquote>


My next task is defining individual functions to eliminate any code redundancy and ultimately speed up the API calls.  Stay tuned!
